chapter_1_3_intro:
^AF: Hi Hero! Today's the big day! I can't wait for the test and to
start orientation at combat school!
^AF: Are you still nervous about the test?

c-0:
^Hero: Yes, I'm not sure what to expect.
Regardless of what happens I'll make the best of it.
c-1:
^Hero: Not anymore. I realized it doesn't matter what affinity I get.
Regardless of what happens I'll make the best of it.

chapter_1_3_mf: ^AF: That's the spirit! Now let's go get MF.
^AF: That's the spirit! Now let's go get MF.
^MF: I can't wait to learn more spells!
^AF: I would be worried if you didn't!
^Hero: Let's head to the blacksmith and do the affinity test!
^Hero: Let's head to the blacksmith and do the affinity test!
